import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { metaTags } from "../../helpers/api"; import Story from "./blog/sroty"; function Blogs() { const meta_tags = { meta_description: "Blogs", meta_keywords: "blogs, news, posts, LUMICC, market, channel", meta_title: "Blogs | LUMICC", page_name: "Blogs | LUMICC", page_url: "/blogs", site_name: "LUMICC", thumbnail: "https://lumicc.com/lumicApi/uploads//images/lumicc-thumb.png?v-55", } useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 3) }, []); return (
{ metaTags(meta_tags) }

Blogs

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit sed do eiusmod tempor.

Hashtags affect the growth of product indicators

Today we spoke with Alpamys Moldashev, the founder of the Rockfiller studio. Here he will tell you how to use hashtags!

Reade Story
) } export default Blogs;
